text: ( Source : OPEC - Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries) Vienna, Austria , 20 October 2015--The price of OPEC basket of twelve crudes stood at 44.92 dollars a barrel on Monday, compared with $45.71 the previous Friday, according to
